sense.def:
To clap
pomeni udarjati z dlanmi skupaj v znamenje odobravanja ali zato, da pritegnemo pozornost.

seg.quote: The audience clapped enthusiastically and called for more.
The vicar clapped his hands for silence.
He called them to order with a clap of his hands.

sense.def:
To clap an object or one's hand onto something
pomeni neki predmet ali roko hitro in trdno nekam položiti.

seg.quote: He claps his hands to his head.
...clapping his cap firmly on his head.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
claps someone on the back or shoulder
, ga prijateljsko udari po hrbtu ali rami.

seg.quote: He clapped her on the back and laughed.

sense.def:
A clap of thunder
je nenaden glasen zvok grmenja.
